snippet: The dispute centers on Al Jazeera’s refusal to turn over “tens of millions of dollars” remaining in an escrow account and still owed to the selling shareholders of Current TV, according to the lawyer representing Mr. Gore.
abstract: Former Vice Pres Al Gore files lawsuit against Al Jazeera, accusing media group of fraud and breach of contract in its $500 million purchase of Current TV; case centers on Al Jazeera's refusal to turn over money remaining in escrow account and still owed to Current TV's selling shareholders, essentially giving it discount on purchase price.
lead_paragraph: The dispute centers on Al Jazeera’s refusal to turn over “tens of millions of dollars” remaining in an escrow account and still owed to the selling shareholders of Current TV, according to the lawyer representing Mr. Gore.

headline.main: Al Gore Sues Al Jazeera Over TV Deal
headline.print_headline: Gore Sues Al Jazeera Over TV Deal
